parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Team Switch

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Enable / disable [[Team_Switch|Team Switch]]. The default setting is enabled.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[enableTeamSwitch]] enable

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> enable: [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[enableTeamSwitch]] [[true]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[Team_Switch]], [[onBriefingTeamSwitch]], [[onTeamSwitch]], [[teamSwitch]], [[teamSwitchEnabled]], [[selectPlayer]]
</value></part></template>
